post.body: But isn't white phosphorus a violation of international law in civilian areas? #gaza
Sadly I know how my tax dollars are spent and no one will listen when I tell them to stop. So they just create more death. #gaza
: shamwow ad here: http://is.gd/2rnr But it makes me want to shamwow in my mouth a little.
Yeah, right, because governments and humans are infallible and always do the right thing without corruption. Oy. #gaza
That story is soo common. I just had the mid 80s explode all over my Facebook. Dam near lost three days to all the messages. =)
Yep, it is the new "it" expletive. People have been bringing the shamwow for hours now. =P
I've never felt this kind of shamwow for any other expeletives. I'm gonna shamwow just thinking about the naughty joys to come.
Mmm, crispy, delicious bailout. Thinking about it makes me shamwow a little bit right in my hand.
I am envisioning an entire year of sweet shamwow cursing. Sizzling shamwow juice! Like bacon, shamwow is hot.
I dunno. I expect it's some infomercial product. All I know is it is an AWESOME new expletive that I want to use constantly.
In your setup of absolutes, there is no solution until everyone is dead. Let's just do it quick and stop wasting time. #gaza
And your is excusing all of Israel's grotesque actions and calling them justified?
Nice to hear that 10,000 Israelis protested Sat. against the war in Tel Aviv. http://bit.ly/qcr0 Another protest 2day here in Portland #gaza
"We're gonna make America skinny again, one slap at a time" So if we bitch slap people, they'll stop eating like pigs? #shamwow slap chop
Give me that shamwow one more time, I told him, and I'll see to it that your shamwow is kicked right out of this building! Zacly!
All you guys dropping shamwow bombs are making my stomach feel all shamwow. What a shamwow way to end my night.
Wow "The Wrestler" was good. A study in desperation, and an Aronofsky classic. And Mickey Rourke brought the shamwow. Deserves an Oscar nod.
Eww, what kind of shamwow is the dog rooting around in?
I kept telling him not to give me that shamwow, but he wouldn't listen. And then damn, he laid a big one, and that shamwow stunk.
jeez the #gaza stream seems extra confrontational tonight. Maybe we need Twitter bombs, and then that would shut each other up, right?
